name: Inner Tao
description:
Inner Tao is a meditative puzzle game where duality fills the whole.

  • Learn the symmetry.
  • Solve stylized hand-crafted puzzles.
  • Master the opposites.
  • Become one with the relaxing soundtrack.
  • Flow and grow.


The Black Moon and The White Sun
walk by the sky's reflection,
shadow and light weave together
a complete world in levitation.
